summary: This is a detailed sex offender registry record for Jeffrey Epstein, maintained by the Virgin Islands Dept of Justice. It lists his personal details, conviction for a non-NYS felony sex offense involving minor female victims, his multiple residences across the US, Virgin Islands, and France, and an extensive list of vehicles registered to him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the sex offender registry document, detailing his conviction, personal information, residences, and vehicles.

events.title: Date of Crime
events.description: The date the sex offense for which Jeffrey Epstein was convicted was committed.

events.title: Date Convicted
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was convicted of a non-NYS felony sex offense.

358 EL BRILLO WAY, PALM BEACH, Florida 33480
GREAT ST JAMES, ST THOMAS, Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was a registered sex offender, convicted on June 30, 2008, for a crime dated July 23, 2006, involving female victims aged 14 and 16.
Epstein maintained a vast network of residences, including primary and secondary homes in the US Virgin Islands, Florida, New York, New Mexico, and France.
The document lists an extensive fleet of over 20 vehicles registered to Epstein across multiple states and territories, predominantly black SUVs.
The registry record was created/updated by the Virgin Islands Dept of Justice - Sex Offender Registry, with a photo date of April 27, 2018.
The original arresting agency was the Florida Dept of Law Enforcement - Sex Offender Registry.
